author: Joe Kovacs
comment: A lot of functions just don't work. I change options but they don't take effect, like temperature from C to F. Returning for a refund.

author: Nicholas Post
comment: Does not work with the new Urbane update.

author: Jeff Youngs
comment: Will not install on LG Urbane

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please install it from Google play store located in the watch

author: Darren Shields
comment: Because love the step counter feature I enjoyed being able to snap a screenshot of my watch face and send it to a friend. Now I can't do that. On the Google wear screen it shows all of my watches but it shows a watch face that I'm not using above instead of the Magnum face. Is there a fix to enable this feature? If I try to snap a screenshot it tells me it's sending a screenshot request but nothing ever happens.

author: Saar Perry
comment: Nice watchface, but the dot numbers are hard to read. 6,8,9 look very similar. Besides that it's very nice

author: William Ostling
comment: will not sync with Google Fit

author: Al Soboleski
comment: The display is good but not flexible enough for me. I like the charge indicators for phone and watch. Frustrated that I can't get a GMT time to display in the digital window.
title: Can't program second time zone

author: George Willeboordse
comment: What do the 10 - 100 dashed curved lines indicate?  One is by the phone charge the other by the watch charge. My phone was at 77% my watch at 99% yet the markers on the curved dashed lines were at the 10 markers in red. What are the dashed markers for then?

author: Mark van Silfhout
comment: One of the better looking watch faces when in full ambient mode (dimmed display with glowing hands)... Weather doesn't seem to update, must be a small glitch...
title: Looks very nice

author: Philippe Teuwen
comment: After trying it for 5 mins, it became suddenly non-interactive. I had to uninstall the app from the phone and reinstall it to get it working again properly.

author: Edwin Geerling
comment: Nice watch faces with in app purchases around $1.50 that open that opens up many more features. Outstanding job devs. This is with Asus 2 which is not on the list.
title: Very impressive 6 stars

author: Michael Fryer
comment: Great watch face. Definitely in my top 5 of watch faces that I own.
title: Very awesome.

author: Carl Malin
comment: Works great and does what it said thank you guys
title: Magnum watch face

author: Kram Rhewdnal
comment: Nice looking watch face. Suggest making digital time and temperature solid so it can be seen better.

author: Simon Rayner
comment: One of my top 10 favourite watch faces. Thanks 👍

author: Claudio C
comment: Love this watch face. One of my favorites.
title: Awesone

author: Tigran Babayan
comment: Unfortunately the feature i am interested in: step counter always displays zero on huawei watch. Had to request refund.  Otherwise nice design an lots of info.
title: Its ok
